events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request concerning a wrong product delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the incorrect product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a return label for the wrong item.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and easy refund process. Looking forward to your confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the return label was sent to your email. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since you have confirmed the refund was received, we are closing this case. Feel free to reach out for any future help.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.
